item.description:
We'll go around the room and ask each of you to speak and answer questions, or ask questions, just
get the conversation going, everything else will fall in place !

The rule is anything spoken in Chinese need to be repeated in English, so no one is left out !

Hope to see you all there !

Best Regards,
Edwin
item.how_to_find_us: Just ask the front desk of Nashua Public Library, or go to Hunt Conference Room and check the post schedule on its door;)
item.why: As in learning any language, practising makes it perfect, there's no substitute for it ;)
item.name: Help2LearnChinese May Meeting
